review: Above and beyond my expectations. I travel for work constantly and it's fantastic to have something so small provide 100% of my entertainment wants.
author: Brandon Griffin

review: Extremely pleased with Amazon's Fire TV Stick.  I initially thought I would need to get some extra adapters to connect it to my Samsung big screen TV since I have had the TV for 4 or 5 years.  But the Fire TV Stick plugged right in and in less than 5 minutes I was watching the first  season of Downton Abbey!
author: Patti G.

review: It's really good I'm buy more 😈
author: darstivenson

review: So easy to use; always fast response when accessed.  Absolutely love it!
author: Jeanie White

review: Very cool, good quality, easy set up, great enjoyment.
author: Jorge Vega

review: It's great being able to stream movies or TV anytime! Love it! There are some charges on some of the apps, but worth it!
author: Mary Flynn

review: I love it faster than using my XBOX One for Netflix
author: Bill Haynes

review: I wish the search function was easier to use.Or similar to redbox where you type in a letter in a category and all the selections come up to explore instead of typing in a full name.
author: Amazon Customer
